description.narrative: The proposed investment is expected to have limited environmental and social impacts which will be sitespecific with none anticipated to be significant. Further, the impacts can be avoided or mitigated by adhering to recognized performance standards, procedures, guidelines and design criteria as described in the followingsections. Thus, this is a Category B project in accordance with IFCs Policy on Environmental and Social Sustainability. Key environmental and social issues applicable for this investment are: design and construction of buildings in accordance with national construction codes and standards, particularly related to seismic resistance and life and fire safety; effective implementation of the environmental, occupational health and safety management plans during construction; energy efficiency and other resources consumption during buildings operation.

Warehouses de Pauw NV (WDP or the Company), a listed Belgian Real Estate Investment Trust (REIT), has requested IFC to provide a long-term loan to support the building of around 1 million square meters of semi-industrial and logistics property throughout various cities in Romania (the Project) over the next few years through its subsidiary, WDP Romania. With the aim to build a 1 billion portfolio in Romania by 2023, the Companys goal is to have its Romania portfolio become 20 percent of its overall asset portfolio.

name.narrative: Project assets will be built throughout the country, including Bucharest, Timisoara, Cluj, Brazi, Oarja, Sibiu, and Paulesti.
